text: Blood and cells of the immune system BG17520 / BR17520 Hazel Davey Reasons for study • (Relatively) easy to get • Single cells not tissues • Varied types • Plasma contains dissolved ions and proteins. • Buffering and osmotic balance • Antibodies • Apolipoproteins – transport otherwise insoluble lipids • Fibrinogens – seal injuries • Nutrients • Metabolic waste • Hormones Campbell et al.
